name: colorMode_setValue
description: This function sets the color mode of a SmartThings device. The color modes include sleep, relaxing, reading modes, etc.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the color mode for.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The specific color mode to set the device to (e.g., sleep, relaxing, reading).

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: Whether the action should be applied to a group of devices.
